notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the kernel SRPM in CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.6. It addresses 19 CVEs: CVE-2022-49872, CVE-2022-50030, CVE-2022-50050, CVE-2022-50087, CVE-2022-50356, and 14 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: kernel security update for CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.6
